animals.name: Aardvark
animals.fact: Specialized long tongue for eating ants and termites.

animals.name: Albatross
animals.fact: Can fly long distances without flapping wings.

animals.name: Alligator
animals.fact: Cold-blooded reptile with stealthy hunting.

animals.name: Alpaca
animals.fact: Social animal valued for soft fleece.

animals.name: Ant
animals.lifespan: A few weeks to several years
animals.fact: Highly organized colony with diverse roles.

animals.name: Anteater
animals.fact: Strong sense of smell, long tongue for insects.

animals.name: Antelope
animals.fact: Adapted for running, distinct horns.

animals.name: Ape
animals.habitat: Various habitats including forests and grasslands
animals.fact: Highly intelligent, shares DNA with humans.

animals.name: Armadillo
animals.fact: Protective armor-like shell.

animals.name: Baboon
animals.fact: Highly social primate with complex structure.

animals.name: Badger
animals.habitat: Various habitats including forests and grasslands
animals.fact: Known for digging, distinctive markings.

animals.name: Barracuda
animals.fact: Swift predator with streamlined body, sharp teeth.

animals.name: Bat
animals.habitat: Various habitats including caves and forests
animals.fact: The only mammal capable of sustained flight.

animals.name: Bear
animals.habitat: Various habitats including forests and mountains
animals.fact: Large mammal known for strength, hibernation.

animals.name: Beaver
animals.fact: Skilled builder of dams, lodges.

animals.name: Bee
animals.fact: Crucial role in pollination, honey production.

animals.name: Bison
animals.fact: Large herbivore with hump, curved horns.

animals.name: Boar
animals.fact: Wild pig known for tusks, omnivorous diet.

animals.name: Buffalo
animals.fact: Large herbivore with hump, curved horns.

animals.name: Butterfly
animals.habitat: Various habitats including gardens and meadows
animals.fact: Undergoes metamorphosis, caterpillar to adult.

animals.name: Deer
animals.habitat: Various habitats including forests and grasslands
animals.fact: Hoofed mammals known for their antlers (in males) and graceful appearance.

animals.name: Dinosaur
animals.lifespan: Varied by species, millions of years ago
animals.fact: Ancient reptiles that dominated the Earth during the Mesozoic Era.

animals.name: Dog
animals.habitat: Various habitats including homes and urban areas
animals.fact: Domesticated canines known for their loyalty and companionship.

animals.name: Dogfish
animals.fact: Cartilaginous fish with spiky fins, often used in fish and chips.

animals.name: Dolphin
animals.fact: Highly intelligent marine mammals, known for their playful behavior.

animals.name: Dotterel
animals.fact: Small wading bird with a distinctive call.

animals.name: Dove
animals.habitat: Various habitats including urban areas and forests
animals.fact: Symbol of peace, often associated with love and devotion.

animals.name: Dragonfly
animals.fact: Insect with unique flight abilities and vibrant colors.

animals.name: Duck
animals.fact: Waterfowl known for their quacking sound and webbed feet.

animals.name: Dugong
animals.fact: Marine mammal often called the 'sea cow,' related to manatees.

animals.name: Dunlin
animals.fact: Small wader bird with a distinctive black belly patch in breeding plumage.

animals.name: Donkey
animals.fact: Domesticated for work and transportation, known for their braying.

animals.name: Eagle
animals.habitat: Various habitats including mountains and forests
animals.fact: Majestic bird of prey known for its keen eyesight and soaring flight.

animals.name: Echidna
animals.habitat: Various habitats including forests and grasslands
animals.fact: Spiny anteater-like monotreme with a long tongue for catching insects.

animals.name: Eel
animals.fact: Slender fish with snake-like body, often migrates between freshwater and saltwater.

animals.name: Eland
animals.fact: Large antelope with twisted horns and distinctive dewlap.

animals.name: Elephant
animals.habitat: Various habitats including forests, savannas, and deserts
animals.fact: Largest land animals, known for their long trunks and tusks.

animals.name: Elk
animals.fact: Large deer species with impressive antlers, also called wapiti.

animals.name: Emu
animals.fact: Flightless bird native to Australia, known for its speed and size.
